Sentence: They insisted that somebody in Istanbul had the medicine and they offered me 100% profit if I could get the medicine for them. When I told them there was no such a medicine, when I showed them the arguments on the Izdinish website, they said they knew that but they wanted to try with the last little hope. I was upset and just politely refused their request by saying something good.
